title: Yuka-Chan No Aijou Hyougen
alternative_title: ユカちゃんの愛情表現 ; Yuka's Way of Expressing Love
status: ユカちゃんの愛情表現 ; Yuka's Way of Expressing Love
description:
Description :
        Beneath the surface of ordinary school life lurks a punk-rock reality.
Kashiwabara's expressions of love for Komori are intense and unconventional.
Will her rockin' yet bittersweet affection ever reach Komori's heart...?!
Source: MangaPlus
